english.segment1: As I turn my face two ways. Take a hold. There can be no hesitation. (Tonight) Tonight, I must fight. This won't be long. I will meet you when I'm strong. Ashes in my eyes bring scars of deception. Blinded I am, forgive me. Forgive me, for I was wrong.
english.segment2: [Chorus]. There can be no hesitation. Take my hand. There can be no regrets
